confirmation.title: Application confirmation
confirmation.header: Thank you for submitting your application
confirmation.sub-header: We have sent you an verification email
confirmation.instruction: Please click the link in that email to confirm your email address

birth-year.label: What year were you born?
birth-year.helper-text: Please note that to be eligible you must be between 18-30 years of age and of the age of majority in your province or territory of residence.
birth-year.required: You must select the year you were born

community-interest.label: If you could make a positive impact on one issue in your community what issue would you want to address and why?
community-interest.helper-text: Minimum of {{min}} words and a maxium of {{max}} words
community-interest.min-word: You must provide a response to question #2 with more or equal to {{min}} words
community-interest.max-word: You must provide a response to question #2 with less or equal to {{max}} words
community-interest.required: You must provide a response to question #2

demographic-id.label: Do you identify with one or more of the demographic characteristics listed?
children-items: Indigenous (i.e. First Nations, Inuit (Inuk), or Métis, or Non-Affiliated)
Recent newcomer to Canada (within the last five years)
Living in a rural or remote area
demographic-id.required: You must select a response for demographic characteristics

disability-id.label: I am a person living with a disability
disability-id.required: You must select a response for living with a disability

discovery-channel-id.label: How did you hear about the Civic Participation Pilot?
discovery-channel-id.required: You must indicate how you heard about this pilot

education-level-id.label: What is your highest level of formal education completed, or enrolled in currently?
education-level-id.helper-text: Please note that there is no education requirement for this program.
education-level-id.required: You must select a response for level of education

email.email-invalid: You must enter a valid email address
email.label: Email address
email.required: You must enter an email address

first-name.label: First name
first-name.required: You must enter your first name

gender-id.label: With which gender identity do you most identify?
gender-id.required: You must select a response for gender identity

is-canadian-citizen.label: Are you a Canadian citizen, permanent resident, or protected person?
is-canadian-citizen.helper-text: A protected person is a person on whom refugee protection is conferred under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, and whose claim or application has not subsequently been deemed to be rejected under subsection 108(3), 109(3) or 114(4) or should be of that Act.
is-canadian-citizen.required: You must indicate if you are a citizen, resident, or protected person

is-information-consented.label: To the best of my knowledge, all information above is true and accurate, and I consent to sharing my response with Employment and Social Development Canada
is-information-consented.required: You must provide consent to share this information
is-information-consented.must-be-true: You must provide consent to share this information

is-province-major-certified.label: I certify I am of the age of majority in my province or territory of residence
is-province-major-certified.link: Find the age of majority in your province or territory
is-province-major-certified.required: You must certify you are over the age of majority
is-province-major-certified.must-be-true: You must certify you are over the age of majority

language-id.label: In which official language would you prefer to be contacted and participate?
language-id.required: You must indicate your language preference

last-name.label: Last name
last-name.required: You must enter your last name

phone-number.label: Phone number
phone-number.phone-invalid: You must enter a valid ten-digit phone number (ex. 506-555-5555)

province-id.label: In which province or territory is your principle residence located?
province-id.required: You must select your province or territory of residence

skills-interest.label: Tell us about yourself, describe your strengths, passions and what motivates you. What skills and knowledge do you hope to gain from this experience?
skills-interest.helper-text: Minimum of {{min}} words and a maxium of {{max}} words
skills-interest.min-word: You must provide a response to question #1 with more or equal to {{min}} words
skills-interest.max-word: You must provide a response to question #1 with less or equal to {{max}} words
skills-interest.required: You must provide a response to question #1

step-2.title: Step 2
step-2.information-note: Please note that the questions in this section will not affect your eligibility for the program, and will be used only for program analysis and evaluation. Please provide the answers that you feel are most applicable to you. You may choose to select ‘Prefer not to answer’ for any question in this section.
